classificationResult

Class ClassificationResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • classificationResult.ClassificationResult

  • public class ClassificationResult
extends java.lang.Object
    Results of the classifier evaluation on the supplied test set

      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getFalseClass()
      Returns the number of falsely labeled instances for each of the classes.
      int getFalseForClass(java.lang.String classname)
      Returns the number of instances falsely predicted to belong to the specified class (classifier prediction: the specified class, true label: some other class)
      int getFalseNegativeForClass(java.lang.String classname)
      Returns the number of false negatives for the class (actual label: the specified class, prediction: some other class)
      int getNoCorrectlyLabeled()
      Returns the total number of correctly labeled instances
      int getNoMisslabeled()
      Returns the total number of mislabeled instances
      java.util.Map<java.lang.Double,Confidences> getPredictions()
      Returns classifier (or ensemble) confidences for each of the classified instances - key: instance id, value: classifier/classifiers confidence/confidences for each of the possible labels.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getTrueClass()
      Returns the number of correctly labeled instances for each of the classes.

      • getTrueClass

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getTrueClass()
        Returns the number of correctly labeled instances for each of the classes. Key: class name, value: no. of correctly labeled instances for that class
        Returns:
        number of correctly labeled instances for each of the classes

      • getFalseClass

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getFalseClass()
        Returns the number of falsely labeled instances for each of the classes. Key: class name, value: no. of instances falsely labeled to belong to that class (they actually belong to some other class)
        Returns:
        number of falsely labeled instances for each of the classes

      • getPredictions

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Double,Confidences> getPredictions()
        Returns classifier (or ensemble) confidences for each of the classified instances - key: instance id, value: classifier/classifiers confidence/confidences for each of the possible labels. Note: assumes the ordering of the confidences Confidences
        Returns:
        classifier prediction for each of the instances
